document_data.mainbody:
anovar Clegg was a commoner from the village of West Harbor in the Mere of Dead Men circa 1374 DR.
In the late 14 century DR, Danovar was a middle-aged human man with salt and pepper hair. Despite being armed with a club and a simple shield, he appeared unsure and wary, looking at strangers as if unsure if they were to hug him or stab him.
Circa the , the recently rebuilt sire village of West Harbor was menaced by a duo of black dragons. In fear of his homes destruction, Danovar Clegg, along with many other villages, picked up arms and began training in case West Harbor needed defending.
